description:
Some love their graphic tees because of the subtle designs that remind them why they all get up in the morning. Others because they are made from super sustainable blends of organic cotton and recycled poly. And then there are those who just can't stop wearing them because they are so lightweight and breathable.

Whatever your reason is for choosing our graphic tees for your daily uniform, they think you're going to love this all-new men's Clay Cliffs graphic.
name: Prana Clay Cliffs T-Shirt - Slim - Mens
